ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Sparse Column 3D demo shows how to use [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.XyzDataSeries3D%603.html']XyzDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ColumnRenderableSeries3D.html']ColumnRenderableSeries3D[/url] to render 3d columns.
The ColumnRenderableSeries3D type supports data in Xyz format (individual sparse points), or Uniform grid format (every X,Z cell has a column). The latter is more efficient but less flexible.
Columns can be colored individually using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class
